Package com.bewsoftware.utils.string

package com.bewsoftware.utils.string
Domain classes used to assist in processing or manipulation of Strings.

Version:
1.0.7
Author:

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Diff
    Diff class provides static methods to assist finding the differences between two Strings.
    Diff.ModifiedLine
    This is an immutable class that holds the line text and attributes recorded for each pair of lines that are different.
